typeSystemDescription.name: hw1-yuerany-nlp-pos-typesystem
typeSystemDescription.description: Data produced/used by the part of speech tagger

typeDescription.name: nlp.pos.PosTag
typeDescription.description: A single part of speech tag produced by a part of speech tagger ex: 'noun', 'verb'

featureDescription.name: pos
featureDescription.description: The name of the part of speech of this POSTag
